nodes.text: Lissarkh was a female Trandoshan Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order during the final years of the Galactic Republic.

A Force-sensitive female Trandoshan, Lissarkh was a member of the Jedi Order, and received training in the ways of the Force. After a time, Lissarkh was selected by Jedi Master Plo Koon to be his Padawan. After years of training one-on-one with Koon, Lissarkh was elevated to the rank of Jedi Knight shortly before the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY.
